column1: SERVICES/BURIAL: Graveside services will be held for Mrs. Willadean Meadows on Sunday
column4: 5 PM with the funeral procession leaving the funeral home at 4:30PM
column7: 2015 with burial to follow in the Meadows Cemetery located in Moss
column8: TN. Their will be no visitation at the funeral home. Officiating will be Pastor Jason Dodson.
